mapper.select: SELECT r.report_no , r.report_title , r.report_status , u.user_name , r.write_date , r.report_note FROM report r JOIN employee u ON u.user_NO = r.user_no

SELECT r.REPORT_NO , r.REPORT_TITLE , r.TRANS_START , r.TRANS_END , t.TEAM_NAME , u.USER_NAME , u.USER_NO , th.TRANS_DATE , th.PURPOSE_USE , th.TRANS_TYPE , th.DEPOSIT , th.WITHDRAWAL , th.BALANCE , th.TRANS_ID FROM REPORT r JOIN TRANS_HISTORY th ON r.REPORT_NO = th.REPORT_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE u ON r.USER_NO = u.USER_NO JOIN TEAM t ON u.TEAM_NO = t.TEAM_NO WHERE r.REPORT_NO = #{reportNo} ORDER BY th.TRANS_DATE ASC, CASE th.TRANS_TYPE WHEN '입금' THEN 0 WHEN '출금' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END
mapper.update: UPDATE REPORT SET REPORT_TITLE = #{reportTitle}, WRITE_DATE = SYSDATE, USER_NO = #{userNo}, TEAM_NO = #{teamNo}, TRANS_START = #{transStart}, TRANS_END = #{transEnd}, REPORT_STATUS = '결재 중' WHERE REPORT_NO = #{reportNo}

UPDATE TRANS_HISTORY SET TRANS_TYPE = #{transType}, TRANS_DATE = #{transDate}, WITHDRAWAL = #{withdrawal}, DEPOSIT = #{deposit}, BALANCE = #{balance}, PURPOSE_USE = #{purposeUse}, REPORT_NO = #{reportNo} WHERE TRANS_ID = #{transId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.CORCARD_NO , c.CORCARD_NUM , c.OWNER_NO , c.CORCARD_START , c.CORCARD_END , c.CORCARD_COMP , c.CORCARD_STATUS , c.BANK_NAME , u.USER_NAME FROM CORCARD c JOIN EMPLOYEE u ON c.owner_no = u.user_no
